Articles.Content:
Don\'t you just hate when for 1 week, you see if your best friend can come to your house, he can\'t, 2ND week he can\'t, 3RD week HE CAN\'T!

This just really make me angry. >
u sure this guy is just wanting to keep away from you? who is confirming that he cant come round?

u sure this guy is just wanting to keep away from you? who is confirming that he cant come round?

He has been my friend since 2ND grade, he just wants to stay with his dad who is having some health problems, which I can understand.
ohh okay. ive had a friend since i was 3(?) year\'s old. weve grown apart, but still mates.

ohh okay. ive had a friend since i was 3(?) year\'s old. weve grown apart, but still mates.

His dad is going through some rough times. Whenever we both want to see each other, we see each other. We play minecraft together and many other things.
